review:
Dr. Tathagata Sinha Roy a renowned Dental surgeon, for me as a patient he is a super life savior. I have found his dental treatment absolutely wonderful and cost worthy. He is amiable doctor and committed towards his patients in terms of his dental treatment procedure with zero pain and fear.
For any dental treatment requirements I must recommend Dr. Tathagata Sinha Roy to my friends and relatives to visit in need of dental treatment at his Aesthetic Care Clinic
**** ******* during this pandemic situation he managed to do the job very carefully with minimum sitting
